author: Alessandra Foresto
title: 22 Absolutely Magical Unicorn Toys Every Kid Needs
text:
Share This Link Copy What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! ← Use Arrows Keys → 1 22 Absolutely Magical Unicorn Toys Every Kid Needs 
If your little one can't stop obsessing over unicorns, don't fight it — join in, just like Instagram, beauty brands , and bakeries all around have! The mythical, glittery creatures are so irresistibly whimsical, there's no wondering why they manage to spark your child's wild imagination. 
Feed your kid's creativity with these 22 unicorn toys that are sure to make playtime a lot more magical. Related:
